services.title: Mobile App Development
services.description: I write high-quality, cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, RESTful APIs and various cloud services.

aboutpara: I am a young cross-platform mobile application developer with a passion for learning and building high-quality software. While Flutter is my Framework of choice, I enjoy using and learning new tools to accomplish my goals. I am a quick learner and a productive worker; pushing functional and intuitive software to consumers.

resume.description: I have delivered a high-quality mobile application to Bethel University for use by their students and staff. I am currently developing Maize: a cross-application for a self-hosted recipe manager.

education.universityPara: First portion of a 3-2 program with University of Notre Dame. Received a BS in Math/Physics.
Second portion of a 3-2 program with Bethel University. Received a BS in Computer Science.
